title: Danger Danger: Twin girls, separated at birth, who run into similar kinds of danger
description: Two lives in parallel â€“ twin sisters separated at birth, but their lives take strangely similar and dangerous roads until the final collision which hurls each of them to the edge of disaster.Katie and her gambling boyfriend Dec find themselves threatened with peril from the people Dec has cheated. Jo-Anne (Annie) through her boyfriend Steven finds herself in the hands of much more dangerous crooks.Can they survive and achieve safety and happiness?
author: Gerry McCullough
